name: Bellossom
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: Bellossom gather at times and seem to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.

poke_power.name: Hustle Step
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon. This power can’t be used if Bellossom is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Dance ’til Dawn
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads. Bellossom is now Asleep.
